page.title: 19MORETON BOWLING CULB
page.content:
{ { {MORETONHAMPSTEAD BOWLING CLUB {
Moreton Bowling Club started its first match on the 9th of June,they set off for Morchard Bishop full of enthusiasm.The 11 members thoroughly enjoyed their visit. Although they lost,(as they expected),they came home determined to play as soon as possible again.The following week the team was entertained by Chagford, and this again proved to be a most enjoyable occation, with a full Moreton team of twelve being fielded.Chagford club has most kindly offered its green for our bowlers to use any Tuesday or Thursday and this invitation is greatly appreciated.
